module.name: extended_geometric_tolerance
module.keywords: module, datum extension, datum, geometric tolerance, dimensioning tolerance

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of geometric and dimensional tolerance data and associated properties that is an extension of ISO 10303-1051. The representation is in accordance with pre-existing standards. The extensions provide additional details and specialization to those capabilities in ISO 10303-1051. The representation supports additional application of datum concepts to those in for instance ISO 1101.

inscope.li: generalization of datum for purposes other than specifying shape tolerance requirements;
description of datum differences for mapping from geometric models to lexical models;
items within the scope of application module Default tolerance, ISO/TS 10303-1052;
items within the scope of application module Dimension tolerance, ISO/TS 10303-1050;
items within the scope of application module Geometric tolerance, ISO/TS 10303-1051;
items within the scope of application module Layered 3d shape, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1694;
items within the scope of application module Requirement decomposition, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1740.

outscope.li: the interpretation of the specifications of particular geometric tolerances
